custom_nodes.author: vrgamegirl19
custom_nodes.title: VRGameDevGirl Video Enhancement Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Film grain and color match nodes designed for high-quality frame-by-frame video enhancement in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: MitoshiroPJ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Nearsighted Attention
custom_nodes.description: This node splits its self-attention Q to focus on nearby samples.

custom_nodes.author: MitoshiroPJ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI SaveImage SDLI
custom_nodes.description: SDLI (Stable Diffusion Latents in Imagefile) is file format, that contains latents and lossy (decoded) image. Detailed format is written at [a/SDLI Tools](https://github.com/MitoshiroPJ/sdli_tools).

custom_nodes.author: BigStationW
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUi-Load-Image-And-Display-Prompt-Metadata
custom_nodes.description: This node displays the positive and negative prompts of a loaded ComfyUi image.

custom_nodes.author: pvlprk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Assistant Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that integrates with the OpenAI Assistants API.

custom_nodes.author: danTheMonk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Int and Float Conversion Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI custom node extension that provides utility nodes for converting between integer and float values.

custom_nodes.author: RamonGuthrie
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RBG-ImageStitchPlus
custom_nodes.description: An advanced image stitching node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: kaipard
custom_nodes.title: Auto Aspect Latent Generator
custom_nodes.description: Add presets for latent and adjust the image size.

custom_nodes.author: wasilone11
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Sync PVM Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allows you to generate personalized video messages (PVM) using audio, video, and multilingual text prompts inside ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: EsesImageResize
custom_nodes.description: The 'Eses Image Resize' node offers comprehensive image resizing capabilities within ComfyUI. It supports various scaling modes including scaling by a specific ratio, target megapixels, or directly to fixed dimensions. The node provides framing options to handle aspect ratio changes, allowing users to 'Crop to Fit' (fill) the target frame or 'Fit to Frame' (letterbox) the image with a customizable fill color. It also generates and outputs a corresponding mask, with control over the letterbox area's color (black or white) within the mask.

custom_nodes.author: manifestations
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Globetrotter Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom ComfyUI nodes and utilities for generating AI image prompts representing the diverse attire, cultures, regions, and appearances of the world. This project is designed for easy extension to new countries, cultures, and body parts, using a modular JSON-based data structure and dynamic node generation.

custom_nodes.author: DesertPixelAi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DP Dynamic Random Styler
custom_nodes.description: A dynamic theme-based prompt generator for ComfyUI that creates versatile, random prompts optimized for face swap workflows.

custom_nodes.author: georgitsenov
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI S3 Save Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for saving generated images directly to Cloudflare R2 (or S3-compatible) buckets using boto3, with secure random filename generation and public URL return.

custom_nodes.author: HappyXY
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AmazonBedrock
custom_nodes.description: use case of llm, image, video models on amazon bedrock

custom_nodes.author: BuffMcBigHuge
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Google-AI-Studio
custom_nodes.description: Google AI Studio by BuffMcBigHuge

custom_nodes.author: Hazukiaoi
custom_nodes.title: LM Studio Tools for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node pack designed for ComfyUI that seamlessly integrates the powerful LM Studio into your workflow, enabling you to perform a variety of tasks such as text generation and image understanding (Vision) using locally run LLMs.

custom_nodes.author: manifestations
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Ethnic Outfits Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI nodes for generating outfit prompts representing diverse ethnicities, cultures, and regions. Uses extensible JSON data for clothing, accessories, and poses, with “random/disabled” dropdowns for flexibility. Advanced prompt engineering is supported via Ollama LLM integration. Easily add new regions, ethnicities, or cultures by updating data files and creating lightweight node wrappers. Designed for artists, researchers, and developers seeking culturally rich, customizable prompt generation in ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: creepybits
custom_nodes.title: Save Image To Google Drive
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI node will save images directly to Google Drive by using Google's free API service.

custom_nodes.author: set-soft
custom_nodes.title: Audio Separation
custom_nodes.description: Audio separation (demixing) using AI. Separating Voices, Instruments, Bass, Drums, etc. CLI and ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: sunx.ai
custom_nodes.title: SunxAI Custom Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes developed by SunxAI for ComfyUI, including image loop processing and more.

custom_nodes.author: risunobushi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_sm4ll-Wrapper
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that integrates with the sm4ll-VTON API for virtual try-on functionality.

custom_nodes.author: DiffusionLight
custom_nodes.title: DiffusionLight-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: DiffusionLight (Turbo) implemented in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Ltamann
custom_nodes.title: TBG_Enhanced Tiled Upscaler & Refiner FLUX PRO
custom_nodes.description: About TBG Enhanced Tiled Upscaler and Refiner Pro! We at TBG Think. Build. Generate. Pro AI upscaling & image enrichment are excited to make our TBG Enhanced Tiled Upscaler and Refiner Pro available to you for free non-commercial use. We believe in empowering creators and innovators, which is why anything you create or generate using our software

custom_nodes.author: DavidPiazza
custom_nodes.title: Network Bending for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom node pack for ComfyUI that enables creative manipulation and 'bending' of neural network models. Perform various operations on loaded model checkpoints to create unique and experimental effects.

custom_nodes.author: IIEleven11
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FairyTaler
custom_nodes.description: This package provides ComfyUI nodes for creating 3-scene storyboards from Ollama text output.

custom_nodes.author: heheok
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_wan2.1_vace_infinite_helpers
custom_nodes.description: This collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI is specifically designed to automate and streamline the process of creating infinite videos with WAN2.1 VACE.

custom_nodes.author: pmarmotte2
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Speaker-Isolation
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that performs speaker diarization to isolate individual speaker audio tracks from a single audio source.

custom_nodes.author: facefusion
custom_nodes.title: FaceFusion ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Industry leading face manipulation platform

custom_nodes.author: Yo1up
custom_nodes.title: Diffusion-Model-Detailer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes that allow the user to control the generation of diffusion models to increase and decrease level of detail. The model patch has no trainable parameters and can be applied to theoretically any diffusion model in existence. whether or not the implementation currently works for every diffusion model in existence is unknown.

custom_nodes.author: philipy1219
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CloudStorage
custom_nodes.description: This extension adds cloud storage support to ComfyUI, allowing you to save and load images, masks, and videos directly from cloud storage services. Currently supports Aliyun OSS and AWS S3.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: EsesCompositionGoldenRatio
custom_nodes.description: 'Real-time golden ratio pattern composition evaluation tool node for ComfyUI. This does nothing else - but you can move, rotate and scale then pattern to find new things and structures in your images.

custom_nodes.author: fchangjun
custom_nodes.title: MultiSaveImage Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for saving multiple images simultaneously with batch processing and resizing capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EsesImageEffectBloom
custom_nodes.description: 'Eses Image Effect Bloom' image post processing effect for ComfyUI, it uses GPU and has optimized blur effect calculations. Minimal dependencies, simple and easy to use UI.

custom_nodes.author: KarmaSwint
custom_nodes.title: KarmaNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom cycling KSampler with progressive upscale and more. Professional post-processing nodes.

custom_nodes.author: S4MUEL404
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI S4Tool Image
custom_nodes.description: A custom node package for image processing in ComfyUI, for automating image processing within the ComfyUI workflow.

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: CalculatorPro - Node Suite for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: utilitaires pour ComfyUI, conçue pour effectuer des calculs et des conversions

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Illusion & Pattern Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, designed for generating various patterns, optical illusions, and performing related image manipulations. All nodes are categorized under 'illusion' in the ComfyUI menu.

custom_nodes.author: aoliao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ElevenLabs API integration
custom_nodes.description: This project integrates the ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech API as a custom node for ComfyUI. It enables seamless text-to-speech conversion directly within ComfyUI, providing the generated audio as a PyTorch tensor for immediate playback or further processing. Ideal for workflows requiring high-quality speech synthesis

custom_nodes.author: Icyman86
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_AnimeCharacterSelect
custom_nodes.description: WAI's Character select ported to ComfyUI with a few tweaks

custom_nodes.author: LK-168
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_imgutils
custom_nodes.description: Image tool kit for comfyui with dghs-imgutils

custom_nodes.author: Cyrus-Hei
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-prompt-bank
custom_nodes.description: A prompt manager on the sidebar for ComfyUI, allowing easy saving and copying of prompts.

custom_nodes.author: Windecay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ReservedVRAM
custom_nodes.description: A simple node that can dynamically adjust the reserved memory of a workflow in real-time, used to avoid the utilization of shared memory.

custom_nodes.author: kaaskoek232
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MemoryManagement
custom_nodes.description: Advanced memory management custom nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: eg0pr0xy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NoiseGen
custom_nodes.description: Professional noise generation nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: o-l-l-i
custom_nodes.title: Olm Sketch for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: An interactive sketching and drawing node for ComfyUI with stylus/pen support – built for fast, intuitive scribbling directly inside your workflows, geared towards ControlNet-style workflows which utilize scribbles and line art.

custom_nodes.author: Good-Dream-Studio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Connect
custom_nodes.description: Expose your workflows into HTTP endpoints directly from ComfyUI itself.

custom_nodes.author: lihaoyun6
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BlindWatermark
custom_nodes.description: Embeds an invisible watermark in the input image

custom_nodes.author: HMG-Fiverr
custom_nodes.title: Random Number Button
custom_nodes.description: This node provides a button that, when clicked, triggers the execution of the node and generates a new random integer between 0 and 1000. The generated number is available as an output.

custom_nodes.author: sdtana
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FDG
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of [a/Guidance in the Frequency Domain Enables High-Fidelity Sampling at Low CFG Scales](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.19713) for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EsesImageLensEffects
custom_nodes.description: The 'Eses Image Lens Effects' node is a multipurpose node for ComfyUI designed to simulate a variety of lens characteristics. It combines several typical effects into a single, convenient node, allowing to add realistic or stylistic lens distortion, chromatic aberration, post-process scaling, and a highly configurable vignette.

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MiniMax-Remover
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-MiniMax-Remover is a custom node for ComfyUI that enables fast and efficient object removal using minimax optimization. It works in two stages: first, it trains a remover with a simplified DiT model; then it distills a robust version using CFG guidance and fewer inference steps.

custom_nodes.author: alchemine
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Alchemine-Pack
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes pack for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: AbstractEyes
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-lycoris
custom_nodes.description: A properly implemented lycoris loader for comfyui.

custom_nodes.author: bobsblazed
custom_nodes.title: Bobs_LoRA_Loader
custom_nodes.description: A custom LoRA loader node for ComfyUI with advanced block-weighting controls for both SDXL and FLUX models. Features presets for common use-cases like 'Character' and 'Style', and a 'Custom' mode for fine-grained control over individual model blocks.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PosterCraft
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-PosterCraft is now available in ComfyUI, PosterCraft is a unified framework for high-quality aesthetic poster generation that excels in precise text rendering, seamless integration of abstract art, striking layouts, and stylistic harmony.

custom_nodes.author: uinodes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-uinodesDOC
custom_nodes.description: This custom node is designed to provide graphical documentation for ComfyUI custom nodes .

custom_nodes.author: puke3615
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OneAPI
custom_nodes.description: Simple REST API interfaces for ComfyUI with dynamic parameter replacement and output management

custom_nodes.author: Gary-yeh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WebPrompter
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node suite for ComfyUI that automates the conversion of web content into an AI-refined news script. This simplified version focuses on the core 'fetch-and-process' workflow for a fast and direct automation experience.

custom_nodes.author: quasiblob
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EsesImageOffset
custom_nodes.description: The 'Eses Image Offset' node offers basic image offsetting capabilities within ComfyUI. It allows shifting image and mask content horizontally and/or vertically, with an option to wrap content around the canvas edges for a tiling effect.

custom_nodes.author: Ambrosinus
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ATk-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Ambrosinus ToolKit - Streamlined workflow export with transparent backgrounds, professional themes, and smart scaling. Perfect for creating clean, high-resolution workflow documentation and sharing.

custom_nodes.author: wasilone11
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Sync Lipsync Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allows you to perform audio-video lip synchronization inside ComfyUI using a simple interface.

custom_nodes.author: AgencyMind
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Satori
custom_nodes.description: When your workflow starts acting weird and you need to know what's actually happening to your data - not just guess from looking at the output.

custom_nodes.author: fotobudka-team
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI AI Faces - Photo Verification Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for automated face verification, designed to check if a person is clearly visible and suitable for passport-style photos. This node performs comprehensive facial analysis to ensure photo quality meets identification document standards.

custom_nodes.author: A043-studios
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ASCII Generator Node
custom_nodes.description: ASCII art generator for ComfyUI with multi-language character set support

custom_nodes.author: Gary-yeh
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-super-captioner
custom_nodes.description: A powerful multi-model image captioning node that supports both local BLIP models and the cloud-based Google Gemini API, specifically designed for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: kpsss34
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Sana Custom Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that supports Sana text-to-image models (600M/1.6B parameters) with advanced features including LoRA support, PAG (Perturbed-Attention Guidance), and optimized VRAM usage.

custom_nodes.author: itsjustregi
custom_nodes.title: Easy Color Correction
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for flexible and efficient image color correction and post-processing.

custom_nodes.author: leonardomiramondi
custom_nodes.title: Flux Context ComfyUI Node
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node for Flux Context (Kontext) image editing

custom_nodes.author: Shiba-2-shiba
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Magcache-for-SDXL
custom_nodes.description: An experimental implementation of MagCache for SDXL
